Who is the founder of the crypto exchange FTX?
Sam Bankman-Fried
What charges has Sam Bankman-Fried pleaded not guilty to?
defrauding customers, laundering money, and violating campaign finance laws
How many years in prison does Sam Bankman-Fried face if convicted on all counts?
115 years
When is Bankman-Fried's trial set for?
Oct. 2
Where was Sam Bankman-Fried arrested?
Bahamas
What was the amount of Sam Bankman-Fried's bail package?
$250 million
Which company did FTX allegedly move customer money into?
Alameda Research
What amount is reportedly missing from FTX according to its new CEO?
$7 billion
Who are the two former associates of Bankman-Fried that have pleaded guilty to federal fraud charges?
Gary Wang and Caroline Ellison
Which two agencies have filed civil complaints against Bankman-Fried?
Securities and Exchange Commission and the Commodity Futures Trading Commission
